scripts.serve: yarn clean && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && yarn server
scripts.dev-build: yarn clean && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp CNAME dist/CNAME && yarn webpack-build
scripts.dev-deploy: yarn dev-build && cd dist && git add --all && git commit -m "Dev-build at $(date)" && git push origin gh-pages --force
